 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָלַע‎</span>] **verb** ==limp== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎טלע‎</span> Aph\`el); — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹלֵעַ עַליְֿרֵכוֺ‎</span> [[Gen.32.32|Gen 32:32]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; of Jacob); feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצֹלֵעָה‎</span> as substantive, of personified Judah as flock [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צאֹן‎</span>] [[Mic.4.6|Mic 4:6]]; [[Mic.4.7|Mic 4:7]]; [[Zeph.3.19|Zeph 3:19]].
